title: Secretly Plotting Your Burial - Welcome to the Afterlife (2008)
description:
For Fans Of: Bright Eyes, Elliot Smith, Alkaline Trio, Trail of Dead, Okkervil River, Say Anything, The Flaming Lips

Secretly Plotting Your Burial

Welcome to the Afterlife

1. Welcome to the Afterlife (2:22)
2. Eternal Damnation, My Summer Vacation (3:27)
3. One Last Request (4:34)
4. The David Lynch Face (3:17)
5. Undying Love (4:55)
6. Duncan Rd. (3:01)
7. Never Again Swanny, I&#039;m Off the Skag (3:53)
8. Dance Monster, Dance (3:45)
9. My Heroin (3:47)
10. Sweet Little White Thing (4:30)
11. The Devil Asked Me Nicely (8:55)
12. One Last Regret (2:24)
13. 666 (5:50)
14. The Apocalullaby (3:17)

Total Runtime: About 57 Minutes


Secretly Plotting Your Burial is:

Johnny Black and Jake Karns

All songs were written by Jake Karns

Johnny B: Acoustic Guitars, Electric Guitars, Backing Vocals
Jake: Acoustic Guitars, Piano, Vocals, Bass

Piano on Duncan Rd. and Welcome to the Afterlife played by Jerome Wincek
Pizza Pan and Guitar Case used as percussion on Undying Love also by Jerome Wincek
Zombies on Undying Love - Jake Karns, Johnny Black, August Dombrow, Jerome Wincek

Welcome to the Afterlife was recorded by Jerome Wincek in his living room
during the winter of 2007/2008 in Oil City, PA.
Mixing was done by Jake, John, and Jerome.
